data.message: Layer 6 hardening - fix 5 sharp edges in intent guard and prompt firewall: All fixes implemented: auto-intent issuance at call_tool, server-side _intent_id injection, vault_id canonical consistency, 8-byte collision resistance, Layer 6 → Layer 5 audit integration.
